src:
Zdjelar: Vratili smo se psihički, spremamo se za Mančester
03 Nov 2019, 10:22 by Nemanja
Fudbaler Partizana Saša Zdjelar istakao je važnost jučerašnje pobede nad Vojvodinom (4:0) uoči utakmice sa Mančester junajtedom.
Partizan je na svom terenu bio ubedljiv protiv trećeplasirane ekipe koju predvodi Nenad Lalatović i sa četiri gola ispratio ,,lale“ u Novi Sad.
 – Odigrali smo jednu odličnu utakmicu iz svih aspekata. Odlično smo branili, bili kompaktni i to nam je donelo niz mogućnosti za pobedu sa visokim rezultatom i lepim golovima. Mislim da je ekipa uradila jedan veliki posao posebno posle poraza koji smo doživeli na Brdu sa Čukaričkim – rekao je Zdjelar, a preneo sajt kluba.
U pojedinim mečevima ove sezone, dešavaju se rezultati koje ekipa nije očekivala, što stvori dodatni pritisak.
 – Koliko sve to bio fudbal i sa neke strane je ljudski kada kiksnete, kada ste u Partizanu svi znamo da se to ne prašta i da se zahteva i očekuje samo pobeda. I dok bi možda neka ekipa pala posle svega mi smo još jednom pokazali da znamo u najtežim situacijama i pod ogromnim pritiskom da se izdignemo i pokažemo karakter kao danas – dodao je Zdjelar.
Crno-bele u četvrtak očekuje novi duel sa Mančester junajtedom u Ligi Evrope.
 – Ova utakmica i konačan rezultat nam je pomogao da se vratimo psihički i spremimo za utakmicu sa Mančesterom – završio je Zdjelar.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Bowman: We're back psychologically, we're getting ready for Manchester
03 Nov 2019, 10:22 by Nemanja
Partizan footballer Sasha Zdjelar stressed the importance of yesterday's victory over Vojvodina (4-0) ahead of the game with Manchester United.
Partizan was convincing against the third-ranked team led by Nenad Lalatovic on his field and with four goals escorted the "tulips" to Novi Sad.
- We played one great game in all aspects. We defended very well, were compact and that gave us a lot of opportunities to win with a high score and nice goals. I think the team did a great job especially after the defeat that we experienced on Brdo with Cukaricki - said Zdjelar, and conveyed the club's website.
In some matches this season, there are results that the team did not expect, which creates additional pressure.
- How football was all that, and on the other hand, it is human when you squeak, when you are in Partizan we all know that it is not forgiven and that only a victory is required and expected. And while maybe a team would fall after all, we have once again shown that we know in the most difficult situations and under tremendous pressure to stand up and show character like today - Zdjelar added.
The Black and White are expecting a new duel with Manchester United in the Europa League on Thursday.
- This match and the final result helped us to return mentally and get ready for the match with Manchester - finished Zdjelar.
